actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to delegate the functions of the Secretary of Transportation under section 3 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to the Urban Mass Transportation Administrator.

summary.text: Transfers to the Urban Mass Transportation Administrator for one year the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to make grants or loans to State and local public agencies to assist the financing of urban mass transportation systems.

titles.title: A bill to delegate the functions of the Secretary of Transportation under section 3 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to the Urban Mass Transportation Administrator.
